area_info.name: Tutorial Cave
area_info.description: A cave system designed to teach new adventurers the basics of exploration and combat.

cave_entrance.name: Cave Entrance
cave_entrance.description: You stand at the mouth of a dark cave. Water drips from the ceiling above, and strange sounds echo from within the depths. Sunlight filters in from behind you, casting long shadows on the rocky floor.

rusty_dagger.name: rusty dagger
rusty_dagger.description: A rusty dagger lies abandoned on the ground, its blade dulled but still serviceable.

main_chamber.name: Main Cave Chamber
main_chamber.description: The cave opens into a larger chamber. Ancient rock formations create natural pillars throughout the space. A small pool of clear water reflects the dim light filtering from the entrance. The air is cool and damp.

eastern_passage.name: Eastern Passage
eastern_passage.description: A narrow passage winds eastward, the walls closing in on both sides. Strange markings cover the rock surface - perhaps ancient carvings or natural formations. The passage ends in a small chamber.

healing_herb.name: healing herb
healing_herb.description: A small herb with healing properties grows from a crack in the wall.

western_alcove.name: Western Alcove
western_alcove.description: A small alcove carved into the western wall of the cave. Ancient bones litter the floor - perhaps the remains of some long-dead creature. The alcove provides good shelter and seems safe from larger threats.
western_alcove.ambient_sound: Deep silence, occasional bone crunching underfoot

old_bones.name: old bones
old_bones.description: Ancient bones scattered across the alcove floor.

silver_coin.name: silver coin
silver_coin.description: A tarnished silver coin glints among the bones.

northern_tunnel.name: Northern Tunnel
northern_tunnel.description: The tunnel leads north into the deeper parts of the cave system. The walls here are different - smoother, as if worked by intelligent hands. The air grows noticeably cooler as you proceed.

boss_chamber.name: Final Chamber
boss_chamber.description: You emerge into the deepest chamber of the cave system. This circular room has a high, domed ceiling that disappears into darkness above. Ancient stone pillars ring the chamber, and a natural spring bubbles in the center. This feels like a place of significance.
boss_chamber.ambient_sound: Bubbling spring, deep echoes from above

crystal_gem.name: crystal gem
crystal_gem.description: A beautiful crystal gem sits beside the spring, glowing with inner light.

cave_exit.name: Cave Exit
cave_exit.description: You climb up through a natural shaft and emerge at the far end of the cave system. Fresh air and sunlight greet you as you step out onto a hillside overlooking a vast forest. The tutorial cave lies behind you - you have completed your first adventure!

encounters.tutorial_goblin: A small goblin guards this area, looking aggressive but not particularly dangerous.
encounters.tutorial_rat: A large cave rat scurries about, its eyes gleaming in the dim light.
encounters.tutorial_multi: Two goblin warriors have made this chamber their stronghold.
